content:
TITLE: Basic Usage of Algolia JavaScript Client
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example showing how to import and initialize the Algolia search client with application ID and API key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-search/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { searchClient } from '@algolia/client-search';

const client = searchClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Search Client
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code showing how to initialize both the full and lite versions of the Algolia search client with application credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/algoliasearch/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { algoliasearch } from 'algoliasearch';

const client = algoliasearch('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');

// or with the lite client
import { liteClient } from 'algoliasearch/lite';

const client = liteClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Search Client in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Example code showing how to import and initialize both the full and lite versions of the Algolia search client. The client is configured with application ID and API key parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { algoliasearch } from 'algoliasearch';

const client = algoliasearch('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');

// or with the lite client
import { liteClient } from 'algoliasearch/lite';

const client = liteClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Insights Client in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code snippet demonstrating how to import and initialize the Algolia insights client with an application ID and API key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-insights/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { insightsClient } from '@algolia/client-insights';

const client = insightsClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Personalization Client
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code showing how to import and initialize the Algolia personalization client with application ID and API key credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-personalization/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { personalizationClient } from '@algolia/client-personalization';

const client = personalizationClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Ingestion Client
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to import and initialize the Algolia Ingestion client with an application ID and API key. This is the basic setup required to start using the Algolia Ingestion API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/ingestion/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { ingestionClient } from '@algolia/ingestion';

const client = ingestionClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Recommend Client in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to import and initialize the Algolia Recommend client. It demonstrates how to create a client instance using an application ID and API key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/recommend/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { recommendClient } from '@algolia/recommend';

const client = recommendClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Query Suggestions Client in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to import and initialize the Algolia query suggestions client with application ID and API key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-query-suggestions/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { querySuggestionsClient } from '@algolia/client-query-suggestions';

const client = querySuggestionsClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Analytics Client in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and initializing the Algolia analytics client in JavaScript. Requires replacing 'YOUR_APP_ID' and 'YOUR_API_KEY' with actual credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-analytics/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { analyticsClient } from '@algolia/client-analytics';

const client = analyticsClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia AB Testing Client
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example demonstrating how to import and initialize the Algolia AB Testing client with application ID and API key credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-abtesting/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { abtestingClient } from '@algolia/client-abtesting';

const client = abtestingClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Composition Client in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and initializing the Algolia composition client in JavaScript. This snippet shows how to create a client instance with your Algolia application ID and API key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/composition/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { compositionClient } from '@algolia/composition';

const client = compositionClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Client Composition
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example showing how to import and initialize the Algolia client composition with application ID and API key credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-composition/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { compositionClient } from '@algolia/client-composition';

const client = compositionClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Algolia Monitoring Client
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code showing how to import and initialize the Algolia monitoring client with application credentials
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/monitoring/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { monitoringClient } from '@algolia/monitoring';

const client = monitoringClient('YOUR_APP_ID', 'YOUR_API_KEY');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Algolia JavaScript Client with Package Manager
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the Algolia JavaScript client via various package managers including yarn, npm, and pnpm. The installation specifies version 5.23.4 of the client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn add algoliasearch@5.23.4
# or
npm install algoliasearch@5.23.4
# or
pnpm add algoliasearch@5.23.4
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Algolia Search Client via Package Manager
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the Algolia search client using different package managers (yarn, npm, or pnpm).
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/algoliasearch/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn add algoliasearch@5.23.4
# or
npm install algoliasearch@5.23.4
# or
pnpm add algoliasearch@5.23.4
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Algolia JavaScript Client via Package Manager
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the Algolia JavaScript client using different package managers (yarn, npm, or pnpm).

```

DESCRIPTION: Command line instructions for installing the Algolia personalization client using yarn, npm, or pnpm package managers. Specifies version 5.23.4.

```

TITLE: Installing Algolia JavaScript API Client with Package Manager

SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-insights/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

TITLE: Installing Algolia Ingestion Client via Package Manager
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the Algolia Ingestion client using different package managers (yarn, npm, or pnpm). The client is installed at a specific version (1.23.4).
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/ingestion/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

TITLE: Installing Algolia Composition Package with Package Managers
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the @algolia/composition package using different package managers (yarn, npm, pnpm). This package is a dependency of the main algoliasearch client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/composition/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn add @algolia/composition@0.0.1-beta.13
# or
npm install @algolia/composition@0.0.1-beta.13
# or
pnpm add @algolia/composition@0.0.1-beta.13
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Algolia Client Composition Package
DESCRIPTION: Command line instructions for installing the @algolia/client-composition package using different package managers (yarn, npm, or pnpm).
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-composition/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```

# or
npm install @algolia/client-composition@0.0.1-alpha.21
# or
pnpm add @algolia/client-composition@0.0.1-alpha.21
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Algolia Search Client via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tags for including the full or lite version of Algolia search client directly in a web page via CDN.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/algoliasearch/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
// for the full client
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/algoliasearch@5.23.4/dist/algoliasearch.umd.js"></script>

// for the lite client
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/algoliasearch@5.23.4/dist/lite/builds/browser.umd.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Algolia JavaScript Client via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML snippet to include the Algolia JavaScript client from a CDN without using a package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-search/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@algolia/client-search@5.23.4/dist/builds/browser.umd.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Algolia JavaScript Client via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tags for including the Algolia JavaScript client directly in a web page through CDN. Both the full client and lite client versions are shown.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
// for the full client
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/algoliasearch@5.23.4/dist/algoliasearch.umd.js"></script>

// for the lite client
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/algoliasearch@5.23.4/dist/lite/builds/browser.umd.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Algolia JavaScript API Client via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML snippet to include the Algolia JavaScript API client directly in a web page using a CDN link. This method is for use without a package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-insights/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@algolia/client-insights@5.23.4/dist/builds/browser.umd.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Algolia Client via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tag for including the Algolia personalization client directly in a webpage via CDN without using a package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-personalization/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@algolia/client-personalization@5.23.4/dist/builds/browser.umd.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Algolia AB Testing Client via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tag for loading the Algolia AB Testing client package from the jsDelivr CDN. This allows usage without a package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/client-abtesting/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@algolia/client-abtesting@5.23.4/dist/builds/browser.umd.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Algolia Ingestion Client via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tag to include the Algolia Ingestion client directly from a CDN (jsDelivr) without using a package manager. This loads the UMD build for browser environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/algolia/algoliasearch-client-javascript/blob/main/packages/ingestion/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```

```
